body_html:
Yes, this was my intuition as well. Which is why I used generated_latent = Variable(encoder(batch_x).data) to avoid backpropagating through it.
But the segmentation fault is the issue, no user error should result in a segmentation fault.
This is not solved, IMO.

body:
Yes, this was my intuition as well. Which is why I used `generated_latent = Variable(encoder(batch_x).data) `to avoid backpropagating through it.
But the segmentation fault is the issue, no user error should result in a segmentation fault.
This is not solved, IMO.
